duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the overall administration and compliance for all benefit programs including medical/dental/vision plans, LTD, STD 401k, and wellness.
Maintains awareness of industry best practices, new developments and trends, and regulatory requirements related to all employee benefits.
Ensures compliance with all government reporting requirements and conducts ongoing analysis and reporting on key benefits metrics.
Maintains pulse on employee sentiment and satisfaction related to company’s benefits offerings, conducting surveys and focus groups as required.
Manages existing wellness programs to analyze effectiveness and research/recommend new initiatives as needed.
Utilizes overall HR knowledge and experience to provide input on people practices, systems, policies, and strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree with an HR emphasis preferred. PHR or SPHR, and benefits and/or compensation certification preferred.
